1334.quoteText:
If you wish to cancel your account or request that we no longer use your Personal Information to provide you services contact us at support@groupon.com.
We will retain and use your Personal Information as necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.
1334.title: If you deactivate your account, Groupon cannot guarantee that they will always delete records.

tosdr.case: This service retains rights to your content even after you stop using your account

1560.quoteText: We also use cookies, tags, web beacons, local shared objects, files, tools and programs to keep records, store your preferences, improve our advertising, and collect Non-Identifying Information, including Device Data and your interaction with the Site and our Business Partners' web sites.
1560.title: Tracking

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
